trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.MigrateAnonymous"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理的方法<xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.MigrateAnonymous"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The ProfileMigrateEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.MigrateAnonymous> event of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> class.
trans-unit.target: ProfileMigrateEventHandler 委派定義為<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.MigrateAnonymous>事件的<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>類別。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.MigrateAnonymous>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.MigrateAnonymous> event of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application as shown in the example for this topic.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.MigrateAnonymous>事件<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔案中類別，如本主題的範例所示。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.MigrateAnonymous>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.MigrateAnonymous> event to copy profile property values from an anonymous profile to an authenticated profile when someone who has been anonymously using your application logs in.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.MigrateAnonymous>事件，以便複製設定檔屬性值從匿名設定檔已驗證的設定檔時有人具有已以匿名方式使用您的應用程式記錄檔。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.MigrateAnonymous>

trans-unit.source: When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase> class.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 具有已啟用的使用者設定檔的應用程式啟動時，會建立新的類別類型的`ProfileCommon`，後者繼承自<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>類別。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>

trans-unit.source: When the `ProfileCommon` class is generated, based on the profile properties specified in the Web.config file, a `GetProfile` method is added that enables you to retrieve a `ProfileCommon` object based on a user name.
trans-unit.target: 當`ProfileCommon`產生類別，根據 Web.config 檔案中指定的設定檔屬性`GetProfile`方法會加入可讓您擷取`ProfileCommon`物件會根據使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: You can use the `GetProfile` method of the current profile to retrieve the property values of the anonymous profile.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用`GetProfile`要擷取屬性值的匿名設定檔的目前設定檔的方法。

trans-unit.source: The anonymous property values can then be copied to the current profile for the authenticated user.
trans-unit.target: 匿名屬性值可以再複製到目前已驗證之使用者的設定檔。
